post.body: really? the apple store at Southcenter?!?!?! why didn't you say hi?!?!
oh no... So excited for those presents...
i miss you too! I'm at home for the holidays and just want to play reverse hide n go seek with you!
i really like them :)
nooooooo! I miss you!
no :( everyone is snowed in and can't get to the theatre...booo
i know! everytime I look outside I'm surprised!
now i've been out of the shower for 40 minutes
Happy Birthday to @kristinahorner and @thebriz
Happy holidays! The power is out, we're snowed in, and i actually couldn't be happier :)

At home alone... Tina...where is my tina! :(
Really...The Wizard of Oz is on TV....I thought I had a day off!
We're not kidding.
So much snow in seattle!
I would stay young and fickle and i.d lock it with a tickle... Um not quite the words but...
